comment.author: 34427466731@N01
comment._content: look like pilot Maurice Prévost: www.ctie.monash.edu.au/hargrave/prevost.html according to that, he held the world speed record for a time. who knew?

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: striatic: We'll add Prévost's first name to the source catalog, with the caution of "probably" until we can find a photograph that confirms that it's the same person. Thanks!

comment.author: 34427466731@N01
comment._content: www.airracinghistory.freeola.com/PILOTS/Maurice Prevost.htm here's another photo of him .. you can tell it is the same person by the distinctive nose.
